Message.Title: Election Analysis
Message.Msg: Whites went for Romney by 20 points. Blacks and Hispanics went for Obama by 93% and 71%. Those under 30 went for Obama 60%. Romney won white voters ( a dying breed) by 20 points. The good news is that Obama will be a lame duck president the next 4 years and will end his presidency at an approval of 30%. In life you reap what you sow.

Message.Title: Why is Obamma bad for the Market
Message.Msg: Market down 300 points. And would have been up 300 points with Romney the winner. Market has increased 60 percent since Obamma took office but yet his election has cause the whole market to crater. So the question is Why?

Message.Title: Call to Conservatives
Message.Msg: I really think all CONSERVATIVES should sell off their equities and go to cash and liquid investments, now is the time. The market manipulation was just a means for progressives to retain power. Most of our economic problems persist and the conservative ideals are losing ground. A universal exit from the markets into safe liquid assets would make a statement and possibly end the debt scheme which only persists as long as we play in their backyard with our 401ks and personal assets. They will eventually drain those assets away with up/down market mechanics and bogus news, while the entire Conservative Collective will methodically move from middle to lower class. The markets are a figment of the imagination for the 130 million Americans spending day-in and day-out trying to grasp a few dollars in DOW, S&P and NAS index moves. It is better to let that manipulation collapse, to remove it from the hands of the FOMC and then everyone must face the debt problem head on.
Get a clue. ALL voters are a "dying breed". Please don't analyze any more, your ignorance is showing.
